nodes.name: Fetch Outlook Emails (Graph API)
nodes.notes: Requires Microsoft OAuth2 credential configured with Mail.ReadWrite + Mail.Send scopes

nodes.name: Trigger Email Processor
nodes.notes: Triggers ADAPTIVE - Email Processor for each message. Set ADAPTIVE_EMAIL_PROCESSOR_WORKFLOW_ID variable after deploying processor workflow.

nodes.name: Mark Email as Read
nodes.notes: Marks processed email as read to avoid reprocessing on next poll
